com.xilinx.rapidwright.util

Class FileTools

  • Object
    • com.xilinx.rapidwright.util.FileTools

  • public class FileTools
extends Object
    This class is specifically written to allow for efficient file import/export of different semi-primitive data types and structures. The read and write functions of this class are only guaranteed to work with those specified in this class and none else. The goal of this class is to load faster than Serialized Java and produce smaller files as well.

      • getLinesFromTextFile

        public static ArrayList<String> getLinesFromTextFile(String fileName)
        This is a simple method that will read in a text file and put each line in a string and put all the lines in an ArrayList. The user is cautioned not to open extremely large files with this method.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the text file to load into the ArrayList.
        Returns:
        An ArrayList containing strings of each line in the file.

      • copyFile

        public static boolean copyFile(String src,
                               String dst)
        Copies a file from one location (src) to another (dst). This implementation uses the java.nio channels (because supposedly it is faster).
        Parameters:
        src - Source file to read from
        dst - Destination file to write to
        Returns:
        True if operation was successful, false otherwise.

      • copyFolder

        public static boolean copyFolder(String srcDirectoryPath,
                                 String dstDirectoryPath,
                                 boolean recursive)
        Copies a folder and its files from the path defined in srcDirectoryPath to a new folder at dstDirectoryPath. If the recursive flag is set it will also recursively copy subfolders from the source to the destination.
        Parameters:
        srcDirectoryPath - The name of the source folder to copy.
        dstDirectoryPath - The destination of where the copy of the folder should be located.
        recursive - A flag denoting if the sub folders of source should be copied.
        Returns:
        True if operation was successful, false otherwise.

      • copyFolderContents

        public static boolean copyFolderContents(String src,
                                         String dst,
                                         boolean recursive)
        Copies the folder contents of the folder specified by src to folder specified as dst. It will copy all files in it to the new location. If the recursive flag is set, it will copy everything recursively in the folder src to dst.
        Parameters:
        src - The source folder to copy.
        dst - The location of where the copy of the contents of src will be located.
        recursive - A flag indicating if sub folders and their contents should be copied.
        Returns:
        True if operation is successful, false otherwise.

      • errorIfFileDoesNotExist

        public static void errorIfFileDoesNotExist(String fileName)
        Convenience assertion to assert that a file exists
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to check

      • getRapidWrightPath

        public static String getRapidWrightPath()
        Gets and returns the value of the environment variable RAPIDWRIGHT_PATH. If this variable is not set, it searches the file system from where the RapidWright code is located and checks if the data directory is present if it is, then it returns the full path name of the directory containing /data. If not (such as when running from a jar file) it returns null.
        Returns:
        The string of the path to the RapidWright, or null if running from within a jar file and RAPIDWRIGHT_PATH is not set.

      • getRapidWrightResourceInputStream

        public static InputStream getRapidWrightResourceInputStream(String name)
        Identifies the proper location for a RapidWright data resource and returns an opened InputStream to that resource. This works regardless if RAPIDWRIGHT_PATH is set or not, if the resource is inside a jar or not.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the resource.
        Returns:
        An InputStream to the resource or null if it could not be found.

      • getRapidWrightResourceFileName

        public static String getRapidWrightResourceFileName(String name)
        Finds and returns a file name that can be read for the corresponding RapidWright resource.
        Parameters:
        name - Name of the RapidWright resource
        Returns:
        The full file name path, or null if one could not be found.

      • getTimeString

        public static String getTimeString()
        This method will get and return the current time as a string formatted in the same way used in most Xilinx report and XDL files. The format used in the using the same syntax as SimpleDateFormat which is "EEE MMM dd HH:mm:ss yyyy".
        Returns:
        Current date and time as a formatted string.

      • getCommandOutput

        public static ArrayList<String> getCommandOutput(String[] command)
        Generic method to run a command in the current shell and return its standard output and standard error
        Parameters:
        command - The command to run
        Returns:
        A list of standard output lines followed by the standard error lines

      • runCommand

        public static Integer runCommand(String command,
                                 boolean verbose)
        A generic method to run a command from the system command line.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to execute. This method blocks until the command finishes.
        verbose - When true, it will first print to std.out the command and also all of the command's output (both std.out and std.err) to std.out.
        Returns:
        The return value of the process if it terminated, if there was a problem it returns null.

      • runCommand

        public static Integer runCommand(List<String> command,
                                 String logFileName)
        A generic method to run a command from the system command line.
        Parameters:
        command - The command to execute. This method blocks until the command finishes.
        verbose - When true, it will first print to std.out the command and also all of the command's output (both std.out and std.err) to std.out.
        Returns:
        The return value of the process if it terminated, if there was a problem it returns null.

      • getUniqueProcessAndHostID

        public static String getUniqueProcessAndHostID()

      • isFileBinary

        public static boolean isFileBinary(String fileName)
        Uses a similar algorithm to diff to determine if the file is a binary file by looking at the first 4k bytes to see if there are any null characters. If so, it is considered binary.
        Parameters:
        fileName - Name of the file to check.
        Returns:
        True if the file is considered binary, false otherwise.

      • isDataBinary

        public static boolean isDataBinary(InputStream is)

      • execCommandGetOutput

        public static List<String> execCommandGetOutput(boolean includeError,
                                                String... command)
        Runs the provided command (arguments must be separate) and gathers the standard output followed by the standard error.
        Parameters:
        includeError - Option to set if the returned list includes the standard error at the end.
        command - The command with arguments separated.
        Returns:
        The list of lines of output from the command.

      • isExecutableOnPath

        public static boolean isExecutableOnPath(String execName)
        Checks if a particular executable is available on the current path
        Parameters:
        execName - Name of the executable (ex: vivado)
        Returns:
        True if the executable is available in the current path, false otherwise.

      • isVivadoOnPath

        public static boolean isVivadoOnPath()
        Checks if vivado is available on current PATH (uses unix 'which' or windows 'where').
        Returns:
        true if vivado is on current PATH, false otherwise.

      • isVivadoCompatible

        public static boolean isVivadoCompatible()
        Checks that Vivado is on current PATH and returns true if RapidWright should be compatible with the version of vivado available. Vivado versions that match or are older than RapidWright are presumed compatible.

      • getVivadoPath

        public static String getVivadoPath()
        Gets the full path to the vivado executable if it is set in the PATH environment variable. Works for Windows and Linux.
        Returns:
        Full path to vivado executable, or throws RuntimeException if not found.

      • getOSName

        public static String getOSName()

      • isWindows

        public static boolean isWindows()

      • unzipFile

        public static void unzipFile(String zipFileName,
                             String destDirectory)

        public static void main(String[] args)
